title: Sun Transit in the 8th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 8th house for Scorpio Ascendant, transformation, hidden matters, and shared resources come into focus. This phase brings heightened awareness of power dynamics, sudden changes, and the need to confront fears or unresolved issues. Authority may be tested through joint finances, taxes, or confidential dealings. While ego struggles and control issues can arise, conscious handling helps you rebuild strength from within. Used wisely, this transit supports deep insight, resilience, and strategic renewal.

sections.title: Transformation & Change
points: Letting go of outdated control patterns

sections.title: Shared Resources
points: Focus on joint finances and obligations

sections.title: Health & Vitality
points: Need to manage stress and recovery
Attention to chronic or hidden issues

closing: This Sun transit urges Scorpio Ascendants to transform from within. Power grows when control gives way to conscious renewal.
